amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for HUD homeless assistance grants by $83 million and reduce funding for the HUD management and administration--working capital fund by an equal amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding (by transfer) for Homeless Assistance Grants by $83 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 232 (Roll no. 455).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Lee.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 232 (Roll no. 455).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
